timeline.bodyText: Could this file's changes explicitly be tested? Manually is fine
timeline.author: david-allison-1

replies.bodyText:
We already test remField in ModelTest. I don't know what more can be tested here.
ja is an array of fields, each field is a JSONObject.
More generally, I just checked, all modified methods are called in ModelTest
replies.author: Arthur-Milchior

replies.bodyText:
This line actually receives coverage during testing: https://app.codacy.com/manual/AnkiDroid/Anki-Android_2/file/47438519737/coverage#l530
As mentioned separately (in Discord) I've been learning GitHub actions and I hope to get the coverage artifact from PRs made more easily available, right now our codacy integration (and all our auto-static analysis) is terrible IMHO (and it's mine! I'm slagging my own work, ha)
replies.author: mikehardy

timeline.message: NF: get in JSON more typed
